title: #535 - George Perez
description:
George Perez, Comedian and actor, seen on the Joe Rogan Experience and host of the, "George Perez Stories" podcast, joins Joey Diaz and Lee Syatt LIVE in studio.

This podcast is brought to you by:

Blue Apron: Go to blueapron.com/JOEY to get $30 off of your first meal and free shipping!
 
Hellotushy.com - Go to Hellotushy.com/church for 10% off of your order and stop using nasty toilet paper forever!
FujiSports.com  - Use promo code CHURCH for a 10% discount on all the best jiu jitsu and martial arts gear.
 
Onnit.com. Use Promo code CHURCH for a 10% discount at checkout.
 

Recorded live on 11/19/2017.
